00043 // __func__ (C99) : The function where the printf is called
00044 // __LINE__ : The line where the printf is called
00045 // __FILE__ : The file where the printf is called

00053 #ifdef NPRINTF
00054     #define PRINTF( fmt )
00055     #define PRINTF_VA( fmt, ... )
00056 #else
00057     #define PRINTF( fmt )                printf( fmt )
00058     #define PRINTF_VA( fmt, ... )        printf( fmt, __VA_ARGS__ )
00059 #endif

00090 /*----------------------- Language Standards -----------------------------------
00091 - C89           __STDC__                                    ANSI X3.159-1989
00092 - C90           __STDC_VERSION__                            ISO/IEC 9899:1990
00093 - C94           __STDC_VERSION__        = 199409L           ISO/IEC 9899-1:1994
00094 - C99           __STDC_VERSION__        = 199901L           ISO/IEC 9899:1999
00095 - C++98         __cplusplus             = 199707L           ISO/IEC 14882:1998
00096 - C++/CLI       __cplusplus_cli         = 200406L           ECMA-372
00097 - EC++          __embedded_cplusplus                        Embedded C++
00098 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00099 // Note that not all compliant compilers provide the correct pre-defined macros.
00100 #ifdef __STDC__
00101     #define PREDEF_STANDARD_C_1989
00102 
00103     #ifdef __STDC_VERSION__
00104         #define PREDEF_STANDARD_C_1990
00105 
00106         #if ( __STDC_VERSION__ >= 199409L )
00107             #define PREDEF_STANDARD_C_1994
00108         #endif
00109 
00110         #if ( __STDC_VERSION__ >= 199901L )
00111             #define PREDEF_STANDARD_C_1999
00112         #endif
00113     #endif
00114 #endif
00115 
00116 #ifndef __cplusplus
00117     #if !defined( __DMC__ ) && !defined( _MSC_VER )
00118         #ifndef PREDEF_STANDARD_C_1999
00119             #error "ISO C99 compiler is required for this code to compile"
00120         #endif
00121     #endif
00122 #endif
